attributes.additional_details: I agree that looters caught on camera need to be accountable and justice seen to be done but the looters not on camera are also accountable,many of the street looters,bankers /politicians/political eliite are not on camera but a trail could be found to make them accountable for looting the countries assets to a massive extent that is leaving a debt that is going to last generations.Can we be really democratic and judge all men/women however rich or poor equally.CAN JUSTICE BE SEEN TO BE DONE!!!!!!!!
